name: LadyBird Bug City
description: This is a Roguelike, its set in a Bug city, where you have swarms of bugs, you have been sent to save the lady birds from extinction, as they are the favoured bug of humans the bugs dont want them around no more. you have bug sprays swat attacks, bug patrols, insectacide, all sorts of stuff, you must eat and drink or you will soon die in the hot bug cities. all the cities are random.
